headline.main: Poletti Becomes Governor As Lehman Quits Albany; Officials See Judge Lehman Give Oath in Interim Succession -- Ex-Governor to Talk With Hoover Here Today STATE'S NEW GOVERNOR TAKING OFFICE AT ALBANY POLETTI INDUCTED AS LEHMAN LEAVES

lead_paragraph: ALBANY, Dec. 2 -- Governor Lehman formally relinquished his post this afternoon, turning over the reins of office for the next twenty-nine days to his personal friend and adviser, Lieutenant Governor Charles Poletti.
abstract: Lehman resigns as Gov to take over new post; congratulated by Lt Gov Poletti
snippet: ALBANY, Dec. 2 -- Governor Lehman formally relinquished his post this afternoon, turning over the reins of office for the next twenty-nine days to his personal friend and adviser, Lieutenant Governor Charles Poletti....

byline.original: By JAMES C. HAGERTYSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
